name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 297,757 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

name: Conductor's Wax Whistle

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to direct a Kobold Cart towards your target, sending a careening troop that collides with enemies, inflicting 496,697 Physical damage split between enemies impacted.

description: A hero's symbolic trophy, for the kobolds need not be summoned. The kobolds yearn for the catacombs.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a high chance to apply Queensbane to your target, dealing 132,580 Shadow damage over 10 sec.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.
